Constructs a sentinel.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value_initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying sentinel and the pointer to predicate.
@2@ Initializes the underlying sentinel with {{c|end}} and the pointer to predicate with {{c|pred}}.
@3@ Conversion from {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Copy constructs corresponding members.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|end|a sentinel representing the end of (possibly const-qualified) {{tt|V}}}}
{{par|pred|a pointer to predicate}}
{{par|i|a {{c|/*sentinel*/&lt;false&gt;}}}}
{{par end}}
